notesStmt.note: Darkening and damp stains around edges. Usage stains. Dirt at lower corners. Repaired and guarded before rebinding.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 19th century.

binding.p: Post-1600. Dark brown leather, blind tooled, with leather straps. Spine: 'Yahya Salih. Chelek Had-Dikduk. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 4117.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
B. Steinhert: purchased from him by the British Museum on 10 May 1890: inscribed, folio [64v] (fse002v).
